Enums
=====

This section lists the available enums in the `balatro` module.

.. autoclass:: balatro.Blind
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Deck
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Edition
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Enhancement
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.JokerType
   :members:

   .. note::
      `JokerType` has over 150 members, representing all the different joker types in the game.
      See the :ref:`joker-types` section for a complete listing and rarities or refer to the source code.

.. autoclass:: balatro.Pack
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Planet
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.PokerHand
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Rank
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Rarity
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Seal
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Spectral
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Stake
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.State
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Suit
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Tag
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Tarot
   :members:

.. autoclass:: balatro.Voucher
   :members:
